title: Samsung now offering big-time $400 cash discount on all Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra configs
description: Yesterday we feared a notable deal on Galaxy Tab S11/Ultra as part of the ongoing Samsung Cyber Week sale. You can land its latest flagship tablet release at $200 off with a FREE official keyboard case thrown in – that’s a seriously notable offer. But we also…
